mapper.select: select sg_no,sg_title,member_nickname,to_char(sg_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') sg_date from small_group s,member m where s.member_no=m.member_no and sg_title like '%'||#{searchkeyword}||'%' order by sg_no desc
select sg_no,sg_title,to_char(sg_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') sg_date from small_group where member_no=#{member_no} order by sg_no desc
select sg_no,sg_comment,to_char(sg_comment_date,'yyyy/mm/dd') sg_comment_date from small_group_comment where member_no=#{member_no} order by sg_comment_no desc
mapper.update: update small_group set sg_title=#{sg_title},sg_content=#{sg_content} where sg_no=#{sg_no} and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.select: select * from small_group_comment where sg_no=#{sg_no} order by sg_comment_date desc
select count(*) from small_group_comment where sg_no=#{sg_no}
mapper.update: update small_group_comment set sg_comment=#{sg_comment} where sg_comment_no=#{sg_comment_no}
